channel.title: Smithing issue?
channel.description: When I smith is laggs and either kicks you or reloads your account. It smiths the bars but you lagg. Does anyone know how to fix this issue?

item.title: Smithing issue?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

killerkody:

I have make so many updates and added so many shops. I don’t want to do that all over again… I spent like 1 month of straight coding to make the server im running… I dont want to do it all over…

Post the code that handles your smithing, in addition to any GameObject actions (clicking furnace, etc)

item.title: Smithing issue?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“killerkody, post:3, topic:428412”]No errors…

Okay, I’ll go and mine then when I want to smith is lags and sits there for a few seconds then you will get kicked then relog or get forced to relog in, but when you log in the bar is smithed.

How can I make it stop from logging you off?[/quote]

If it lags, then there’s obviously a problem.

Any errors client side?

Read full topic
